; SCANDAL、Non 和 Nishina 为 Billboard Japan Women in Music Vol.1 演唱会点亮 Yaon 舞台https://www.billboard.com/music/music-news/billboard-japan-women-in-music-vol-1-concert-scandal-non-nishina-1235466593/ Wed, 08 Nov 2023 19:58:33 +0000 MusicMusic NewsBillboard Japanbillboard women in musicGlobalJapan https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235466593 This concert was the first with multiple headliners on the bill organized as part of the WIM initiative in Japan.

11 月 3 日，仁科、 SCANDAL和 Non 在东京历史悠久的日比谷露天音乐厅登上舞台，参加 Billboard Japan 的 Women In Music Vol.1 活动，在晴朗的秋日天空下用充满个性的歌曲和表演为粉丝们带来欢乐。

这场音乐会是日本 WIM 倡议的一部分，首次有多名头条人物参加该音乐会，该倡议于去年启动，旨在表彰为音乐做出重大贡献并通过其工作激励其他女性的艺术家、制作人和高管，正如 Billboard 所自 2007 年起在美国进行。

日比谷公园（音乐爱好者称之为“Yaon”）的露天音乐厅今年将庆祝其成立 100 周年。 11月3日恰逢国定假日，活动现场聚集了大批男女老少的粉丝。音乐会开始前播放的音乐充分体现了当天的庆祝精神，其中包括西方女性艺术家的歌曲，如辛迪·劳珀 (Cyndi Lauper) 的《女孩只是想玩得开心》(Girls Just Wanna Have Fun)、仙妮亚·唐恩 (Shania Twain) 的《男人！我感觉自己像个女人！”以及多莉·帕顿的“朝九晚五”让雅昂人群热了起来。

当晚的司仪喜剧三人组《女英雄3》中的福田真希和奏宣布活动开始后，仁科拉开了演出的序幕。这位25岁的新晋创作歌手和她的乐队在热烈的掌声中出现在舞台上，表演了“慢动作”。悠闲而又日益激烈的表演为她的六首歌奠定了恰当的开场，她的热情逐渐温暖了观众。

“这是我第一次在雅温打球，所以我一直很期待，”仁科在前往“东京大理石”之前告诉观众。她手里拿着泡泡枪，一边向观众席吹肥皂泡，一边从舞台的一端跳到另一端，显然很享受在这个历史舞台上的时光。

在《Kedamono no Friends》中，这位歌手手里转动着假尾巴，随着观众的节奏鼓掌，轻松地跳舞唱歌。有一次，她因为在舞台上走来走去，差点绊倒。她笑着说道：“你看到了吗？恢复得多么惊人啊！”通过这样的交流让观众感到安心，她接着首次现场表演了《糖点》。当她演唱《重烟》时，室外场地已是黄昏，她低沉、含糊的歌声在凉爽的秋风中萦绕不去。仁科以一首由衷地演绎的凄美民谣《seiran yuei》结束了她的演出，履行了她为首届 WIM 活动开幕的重大责任。

换台时，福田和奏出现在舞台上，解释了活动的目的。 “我们希望每个人都能通过这些独特的现场表演感受到女性的力量和多样化的可能性，”他们说。 “这个项目的理念是采取行动消除包括音乐在内的各个行业的性别不平等，让世界成为所有性别的人都可以成为最好的自己的地方。”两位喜剧演员分享说，现在越来越多的人带着孩子进入他们的领域，新的价值观变得越来越普遍。

这时，仁科回到舞台与两位主持人一起说道：“现在天已经黑了，但我们是在太阳出来的时候开始的。我在想它是多么美丽，度过了一段非常美好的时光。”当被问到写歌时是否意识到自己的性别时，她回答说：“我不会想太多，但我会尽量尊重‘你就是你’，照顾好自己，尊重别人。”

名单上的下一位艺术家是 Non，她的最新专辑《PURSUE》的命名反映了她所尊敬的女性类型：追求自己想要的东西并坚持到底的人。这位身着鲜红色服装的伴奏乐队出现在舞台上，这位多才多艺的艺术家拿起她标志性的红色 Telecaster 吉他，以她与日本流行摇滚乐队 ASIAN KUNG-FU GENERATION 的合作项目“Beautiful Stars”开场。

“我很兴奋，因为我夹在两个非常酷的表演中间，Nishina 和 SCANDAL，”她在表演下一首歌曲之前说道，“哦！哦！哦！”当人群一起唱歌时。然后她告诉大家“坐下来，因为下一个是柔和的”，当“Kouya ni tatsu”（“站在荒野中”）的前奏开始播放时，人群骚动起来并爆发出热烈的掌声。歌迷们为 Non 精彩的表演而着迷，这首深刻的民谣令人着迷。

在以温暖、中速的曲目“Azayaka na hibi”（“Vivid Days”）结束她紧凑但令人满意的演出之前，她再次向雅昂观众发表了讲话。 “这是我第一次在这样的活动中表演，作为法案中三场表演的一部分，”她说。 “我认为我们可以一起享受音乐真是太好了。我的心好充实啊我祝愿你们今天、明天、后天以及以后都有很多美好的日子。”

当福田和奏邀请她回到台上并在她的片段结束后聊天时，Non 再次强调了她是多么期待这一天。 “我很高兴今天能够与我的乐队一起演奏，因为当我们与 Reichi 'Chabo' Nakaido 的乐队在这里的演出因台风而取消时，我感到很失望，”她说。

活动最后由拥有 17 年历史的老牌全女性乐队 SCANDAL 压轴。 8月份，当宣布该乐队获得吉尼斯世界纪录认证为“由同一音乐家（女性）演奏时间最长的摇滚乐队”时，四位成员受到了热烈的欢呼。身着黑衣的成员们以乐队令人振奋的最新单曲“Highlight no naka de bokura zutto”拉开了他们的演出序幕。

随着探照灯在会场上闪烁，乐队继续表演其代表曲目之一“Shunkan Sentimental”，引子一开始，观众就自发地尖叫起来。四位女子的精彩表演让这座历史悠久的会场充满了狂热。

这支经验丰富的乐队继续推出一系列紧凑的作品，涵盖了其著名曲目中的亮点。 “我现在已经三十多岁了，在 SCANDAL 中演奏真是太有趣了，”吉他手兼主唱 HARUNA 说道，赢得了雷鸣般的掌声。 “我希望你能感受到我们四个人站在舞台上，将我们的声音连接在一起，就像光一样。”

女人们表演了《Sisters》，作为对当晚主题的耳目一新的呐喊，然后以音乐会歌曲《SCANDAL BABY》结束了她们的演出，并愉快地齐声歌唱。在第二节中，主音吉他手 MAMI 和贝斯手 TOMOMI 挤在 HARUNA 身边，与鼓手 RINA 进行眼神交流，他们翻唱了粉丝最喜欢的歌曲，以高调结束了活动。

在赛后聊天中，RINA表示：“现在发生这样的活动，我认为我们有更多的机会互相了解。我们希望我们能够共同生活，同时尊重我们每个人的价值观。我希望我们能够一起享受生活，不放弃任何东西。”当被问及继续作为“女子乐队”表演的想法时，HARUNA回答说：“我们觉得对我们四位成员来说，互相体贴并享受随着年龄的增长而发生的变化很重要，所以我们希望永远不会忘记这一点，享受我们在一起的时光。”

Nishina和Non也受邀分享了他们对这次活动的印象，前者评论道：“我和来自不同流派的非常酷的女音乐家并肩表演，度过了一段愉快的时光”，而后者则分享道：“我真的很喜欢在这里今天听了仁科和SCANDAL的现场表演，觉得他们太酷了，表演也很开心！”

随着《Billboard Japan》宣布其《Women In Music Vol. 2》，对女性的庆祝活动将继续下去。第 2 场活动定于 2024 年 2 月 8 日在东京巨蛋市政厅举行。下一场音乐会将由歌手兼作曲家 Reo Ieiri 和 Miliyah Kato 与管弦乐队合作，带来强有力的声音。

Billboard has more than 200 different weekly charts, encompassing numerous genres and formats.

Here's a look at 10 titles by artists who appear on surveys for the first time on the Nov. 11-dated charts.

Dylan Marlowe

The singer-songwriter from Statesboro, Ga., is now a Billboard -charting artist thanks to his new single “Boys Back Home” featuring Dylan Scott. The collab, released Oct. 27 via Sony Music Nashville, debuts at No. 49 on Hot Country Songs with 2.4 million US streams and 2,000 downloads sold in its opening week, according to Luminate. It also starts at No. 9 on Country Digital Song Sales, while Marlowe debuts at No. 37 on the Emerging Artists chart.

TikTok, where Marlowe boasts nearly 500,000 followers, has been a significant factor in the song's growing profile. A portion of the track has been used in over 4,000 clips on the platform, where Marlowe had teased the song leading up to its release.

While Marlowe makes his first chart appearance as a recording artist, he logged one previous entry as a songwriter. He co-wrote (along with Jimi Bell and Joe Fox) Jon Pardi's 2022 hit “Last Night Lonely,” which spent a week at No. 1 on Country Airplay, and reached No. 5 on Hot Country Songs and No. 27 on the Hot 100.

Marlowe, now based in Nashville, has been releasing his own music since 2018 and dropped his debut eight-track EP, Dirt Road When I Die , in July. He's slated to open for Morgan Wallen on the Atlanta tour stop of his One Night at a Time World Tour on Nov. 10. He also has a supporting slot on HARDY's The Mockingbird & The Crow Tour in December.

Bby

The band scores its first appearance on Billboard ’s charts with its breakthrough single, “Hotline.” The song, self-released Aug. 3 and now being promoted by Glassnote Entertainment Group, debuts at No. 38 on Alternative Airplay (up 3% in plays). Bby is comprised of Benjy Gibson (whose brother, Fred Again.., has maintained a steady presence on Billboard ’s dance/electronic charts), Dragonking, Deon Graham, Tommaso Medica and Tom Parkin.

The group has released two other songs: “Money Body” on Sept. 12, and “Gold Teeth & Fenty” on Oct. 26.

Jaidyn Alexis

The Los Angeles-based social media influencer and rapper is new to Billboard ’s charts with her breakout song, “Barbie.” The track, released Oct. 2 on Milf Music, debuted on the TikTok Billboard Top 50 chart dated Oct. 21 and rose 13-8 on the Nov. 4 ranking. The song's success now sparks her No. 30 debut on the Nov. 11-dated Emerging Artists chart.

TikTok has been instrumental in the song's growing profile, as a portion of the track has been used in over 400,000 clips on the platform.

Outside of “Barbie,” Jaidyn Alexis has released three other songs on streaming services: “Stewie” in June, “Workout” in July and “Post Opp, in September. On Oct. 24, she announced on Instagram , alongside her boyfriend Blueface that she had signed with Columbia Records.

310babii

The rapper scores his first Billboard chart hit with “Soak City (Do It).” The song, released in June on sa.vo sounds, rose 29-27 on the Nov. 4-dated TikTok Billboard Top 50 chart, after debuting on the Oct. 7 list. This week, 310babii debuts at No. 31 on the latest Emerging Artists chart.

The song appears on the rapper's debut full-length LP Lottery Pick , released in June. “Soak City (Do It)” has also been boosted by a remix featuring Mustard, OhGeesy, BlueBucksClan, Tyga and Blueface, released Sept. 8. The track has also soundtracked over 300,000 clips on TikTok.

Tommy Richman & FELIX!

Both artists earn their first Billboard chart placements thanks to their featured appearances on Brent Faiyaz's “Upset.” The song, released Oct. 27 on Faiyaz's new project Larger Than Life , debuts at No. 12 on Hot R&B Songs and No. 33 on Hot R&B/Hip-Hop Songs with 4.6 million US streams. A$AP Ant & CruddyMurda

Both artists land on Billboard ’s charts for the first time thanks to their featured appearances on Brent Faiyaz's “On This Side.” The song, released Oct. 27 on Faiyaz's new mixtape Larger Than Life , debuts at No. 24 on the Hot R&B Songs chart with 2.9 million US streams. A$AP Ant (real name Adam Kirkman), from Baltimore, has been a member of the hip-hop collective A$AP Mob for over a decade. He has also released nearly a dozen of his own albums, dating to his debut solo project The Prelude in 2018. His most recent album, The Postlude , dropped in March. CruddyMurda has released four solo LPs, most recently #FreeTheCruddy in September.

VaporGod

VaporGod reaches Billboard ’s charts for the first time thanks to “Diamondz n Roses.” The viral hit, released in March, debuts at No. 33 on Hot Dance/Electronic Songs with 1.1 million official US streams (up 96%) in the latest tracking week.
